pages.text: The $(mob)Baby Heatscar Spider$() is a variant of the $(l:minecraft_spider)$(mob)Spider$() that spawns in the $(thing)Nether$(), or when an adult $(l:natura_heatscarspider)$(mob)Heatscar Spider$(). Compared to normal $(l:minecraft_spider)$(mob)Spiders$(), it is simply immune to fire and drops $(l:natura_heatscarspider)$(mob)Flamestring$() instead of $(l:minecraft_spider)$(mob)String$().
